name: Welder
description:
Controls :

       Click + drag tiles to move them

        While dragging right click to rotate

        Arrow keys to move between screens (Wait for it to transition fully, its a bit finicky)

The classic puzzle game Tangrams as a video game!

Weld the scraps of metal together by placing them over the outlined shape.

*Note*

As we were low on time, the game won't tell you when you've completed a level. Feel free to move on when you feel like your ready to.

All assets created by us except for the Lospec palate used on this page. https://lospec.com/palette-list/moss
